text: Ewing Scott (1897–1971) was an American writer, producer and director. He specialised in films that involved location filming. ==Select Credits== *Igloo (1932) *Untamed Fury (1947) *Harpoon (1948) *Arctic Manhunt (1949) ==References== ==External links== *Ewing Scott at TCMDB *Ewing Scott at BFI *Ewing Scott at Letterbox DVD * Category:American film producers Category:American film directors Category:1897 births Category:1971 deaths Category:20th-century American screenwriters
title: Ewing Scott
